entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • add support for abstract namespaces in Unix domain sockets #77931
  • Error when creating a new Guid in a WASM console project #77927
  • Enable logging for the DAC build #77922
  • SuperFileCheck causes runtime.linux-x64.Microsoft.NETCore.Runtime.JIT.Tools prebuilt in source builds #77920
  • Rename System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory to Directory.Create to be consistent with File API #77919
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Generate native/manage stack traces for runtime test crashes #77918
  • Investigate instability in TE for Arm64 #77916
  • Consolidate IndexOf variations into helper in regex source generator and compiler #77905
    8.0.0
  • [Wasm] WebAssemblyHttpRequestMessageExtensions should be part of the BCL #77904
  • CA1416 Triggered even though platform validity check has been completed. #77902
  • Audit direct usages of SetRegOptional/SetContained #77901
  • Crash in ThrowHelper.ThrowJsonReaderException #77898
  • System.Text.Json's generator causes considerable package size increase #77897
  • ValueTaskSource.OnCompleted race condition dispatch cascade #77896
  • PluginLoadContext and Ef DBContext -memory leak - not unloading #77892
  • Frozen collection follow-ups #77891
    8.0.0
  • CI test failures in GenerateRuntimeGraphTests on tvOS simulator and iOS simulator. #77889
    8.0.0
  • System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager package contains assemblies with inconsistent versions #77887
  • Assertion failed '!"Should not see phi nodes after rationalize"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #77886
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: XxHash128 #77885
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `dotnet-runtime-perf` pipeline completely broken #77883
    8.0.0
  • dotnet.create() does not throw error when WebAssembly.instantiateStreaming() fails #77882
  • Cannot restore on s390x #77879
  • SuperPMI: use an arena allocator for MethodContext #77878
    Future
  • DataContractSerializer caches collectible types in statics #77877
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce highly-efficient binary serialization abstraction #77875
  • [API Proposal]: params ReadOnlySpan<T> overloads for existing params T[] overloads #77873
    8.0.0

Closed

  • `c_runtime.memcpy` PAL tests are failing #77914
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Write to unaliased local overlaps outstanding read"' during 'Rationalize IR' #77773
    8.0.0
  • Runtime does not build with latest Xcode due to deprecated functions #77907
  • [API Proposal]: adding explicit casting from int, float, double, byte, decimal to bool #77908
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection Methods in .NET 6 Linux #77634
  • [API Proposal]: Provide optimized read-only collections #67209
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Hashing's ref is missing a csproj #77846
    8.0.0
  • There is no int 128 #77912
  • ReadyToRun: The type initializer for 'System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.Converter' threw an exception. #77862
  • Support ODBC connection strings longer than 1024 characters #63630
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce an [Experimental] attribute to complement [Obsolete] #77869
  • `ActivityListener` callbacks `ActivityStarted` and `ActivityStopped` intermittently triggered twice for same `Activity` #76757
    Future
  • Assert content is type System.Net.Http.EmptyContent #77893
  • Unable to run any Libraries tests on Ubuntu 22.04 ARM64 #75374
    8.0.0
  • arm64 linux runtime SIGSEGVs on console helloworld #77217
  • [API Proposal]: BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness #75901
    8.0.0
  • MemoryCache Compact/Removal Efficiency #76643
    Future
  • superpmi-replay pipeline fails when re-run in CI due to the log artifact already existing #77295
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add AVX-512 testing pipeline #77930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve coreclr test infra #77929
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable Microsoft.NETCore.Runtime.JIT.Tools for source build #77928
  • [release/6.0] Suppress warnings for deprecated keychain APIs #77926
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 6.0.x
  • Improve IndexOf handling in regex source generator / compiler #77925
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Suppress warnings for deprecated keychain APIs #77924
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.x
  • Make DAC logging opt-in #77923
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Backport pr75366 to 6.0 #77921
    area-Serialization
  • Improve AllVars bit set #77915
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix rerunning crossgen2 tests #77903
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Revert "Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion" #77899
  • Add and use a MakeSrcRegOptional that validates IsSafeToContainMem was called #77895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Sync linker to NativeAOT #77894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for dehydrated runtime data structures #77884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize XxHash3 on ARM platform #77881
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Support JsonExtensionData in src-gen fast-path #77880
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Trying to optimize Add #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove nonexistent tests from PAL test run files #77917
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Suppress warnings for deprecated keychain APIs #77911
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Work around invalid IR with field morphing temps #77848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vectorize {Last}IndexOfAny{Except} for ASCII needles #76740
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Add FrozenDictionary/Set #77799
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add System.IO.Hashing ref csproj #77856
    area-System.Security
  • If conversion should not convert PHI nodes (#77886) #77888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve JIT bit sets #77876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Propagate only BBF_COPY_PROPAGATE flags during inliner substitution #77845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding issue #77889 to GenerateRuntimeGraphTests. #77890
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • source-build: set the properties to build for mono runtime. #77786
    community-contribution
  • Update api-review-process.md #77860
    area-Meta
  • Remove SharedFxLookup tests #77858
    area-Host
  • Remove `palrt` from JIT and remove `memcpy` from PAL #77556
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Move `LibraryImport`s of `System.Data.OleDb` to `Common\src\Interop` #77674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Add readme for System.Linq #77672
    area-System.Linq, 8.0.0
  • Add BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness for spans of elements #76339
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] WasmAppHost docs #77265
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use backport workflow from arcade repo #77844
    area-Infrastructure
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}hP{re,ost}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] browser profiler (again) #77779
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove "wprintf" from PAL #77852
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Make Type.IsEnum and Type.GetEnumUnderlyingType intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Linker into runtime diff #77569
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-linker
  • EventListener: Add test for logging a null string in an EventSource #77172
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • Fix EC curve name case sensitivity on Windows #77801
    area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #77059
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 7.0.x
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages (backport of #75597) #77509
    community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Define __cpuid{ex} only when there's no builtin one (backport of #73065) #77507
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Allow deleting any kind of nodes after address mode formation #77872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include dependently promoted fields in SSA #77238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] MiniJIT OP_XEQUAL for floats #77770
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix CPU_COUNT check for FreeBSD 13.1+ #77867
    os-freebsd, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts (backport of #74504) #77508
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Remove `fgMorphBlockOperand<struct>` #77688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well (backport of #66594) #77506
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.12
  • Fix mono arm assert with large return structs #77854
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 #75648
    NO-MERGE, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Use Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess #77847
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Updating CreateScalar to be intrinsic for Vector64/128/256 #77798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adds readme for more extension items #77865
    area-Meta
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [MONO] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix DebuggerTypeProxy for structs and for classes with multiple constructors #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Added null-checks for LDFLDA on pointers. #77827
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix timeout in regex test #77817
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Adding EVEX encoding logic for RR/AM pathways #77419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Managed EventSources do not show up by default in EventPipe sessions (#75248) #77811
    Servicing-approved, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.1

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet publish Blazor project fails at compression #28884
  • Passing MSBuild properties to 'dotnet test' is not working in .NET 7 RC2 #28511

Updated

  • dotnet publish fails for web project when web.config is read-only #15051
  • `dotnet sln add` should allow non-project files to be added to the solution #9611
    Backlog
  • Building legacy iOS projects fails with latest Mono and .NET 6.0.300 SDK #25651

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28907
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28905
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28904
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28882
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch the resolver to target net7 as we expect VSMac to move forward… #28879
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Arcade to Use svc providers - release/6.0.1xx branch #28744
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable Codeql #28877
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce PublishSelfContained #28714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve Tests for Implicit RIDs and Libraries #28696
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28875
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce PublishRuntimeIdentifier #28717
    Area-CLI

Updated

  • Support calling unique launch profiles with a case-insensitive nature & Improve errors around launch profiles #28908
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28892
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime (backports #21748) #27849
    Area-External
  • [release/6.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined (backport #28380) #28782
    Area-ReadyToRun

entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HATS driven user/session exploration to identify progression/regression over the dev17 releases #65232
  • Rename UI can appear offscreen #65230
    17.5

Closed

  • Fix up integration tests and make it required in PR validation #64545
    17.5 P1
  • Completion sugests items that do not satisfy generic constraint #39689
    Backlog
  • "Replace with method" refactoring on properties deletes attributes #25367
    Backlog
  • Infinite loop in SuppressMessageAttributeState.Resolve #51386
  • Performance: Improve `GetTypeByMetadataName` fail path #64142
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete unnecessary implementation of LocalizableProperties #65236
    Area-IDE
  • Allow 'initialize property' to recognize simple throwing properties. #65235
    Area-IDE
  • Expand on the verification the nav-to tests do. #65234
    Area-IDE
  • Generalize error message for CS1997 #65231
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add F1 help keyword for `default` constraint #65229
    Area-IDE
  • Update versions of various things in order to not resolve a CG alert #65227
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove "System.Threading.Channels" from vsix #65028
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert nav-to streaming #65238
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Filter out complex reduced extensions when we have high confidence they are not applicable. #65225
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65218
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65237
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Transfer over accessor attributes when converting to methods. #65226
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Semantic snippets - constructor snippet #64489
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65233
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Reduce amount of allocated MissingMetadataTypeSymbol symbols during various lookup operations. #65046
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add langversion checks for lambda optional and `params` parameters #65140
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65224
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65239
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Enable GeneratedFilesOut for VB #63759
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Implement `EEMethodSymbol.DeclaringSyntaxReferences` #65207
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive
  • log data for analyzers/codefixes/refactorings #65158
    Area-IDE
  • Fix extract local in base initializer #65159
    Area-IDE
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` conversion warnings #64961
    Area-Compilers
  • Cache translated imports in PEModuleBuilder #65215
    Area-Compilers
  • Incremental generator nodes must run when no result history #65223
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve parser error recovery around misplaced semicolon #65089
    Area-Compilers
  • Add "Make declaration partial" codefix #65018
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: updates #44886
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #44885
  • regular problems of MapFallbackToFile method for help #44881
  • Blazor Webassembly Project Template no longer works #44880
  • Limit the speed of Virtual Component #44878
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes_nodejs, json_netty #44875
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, updates, updates #44874
  • Blazor WASM project won't build due to missing browser-wasm 7.0.0-rtm.22473.12 package #44872
  • Error handling from non-Blazor events (e.g. Timer) #44871

Closed

  • Repo `src/docs` page on creating a repro project #39605
    8.0-MQ
  • HTTP/3: Kestrel should send a 431 status for headers too long #33622
    6.0.12
  • Kestrel HTTP/2 should send a 431 status for headers too long #17861
    6.0.12
  • HPackDecoder buffer resizes too large #44643
    6.0.12
  • Run Debugger on WebApi project which is stored within WSL2 #44751
  • Return enumerable as json lines #44778
  • Hub SignalR freezing main thread called from another thread #44578
  • Running ASP.NET Core apps using HTTPS on macOS results in Keychain Access prompts #44754
    7.0.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Update bug template for razor-compiler migration #44889
    area-infrastructure
  • Update README.md #44888
  • Fix SiteExtension loading on App Service #44887
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • [main] Remove feeds, add to SiteExtension bundle #44882
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Remove experimental and downlevel feeds #44879
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Remove experimental and dotnet5 feeds #44877
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/2.1] Remove VS feeds #44876
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Create repro.md #44883
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 7.0.1 #44768
    area-infrastructure
  • [feature/green-threads] Update dependencies #44884
    area-infrastructure
  • [7.0] Limit the hpack buffer resize #44644
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • Use backport workflow from arcade repo #44865
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Make Kestrel prefer on-disk cert for macOS bind. #44835
    8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] add ppc64le arch to crossgen2 not available list #44536 #44583
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Produce arch-specific ANCM redist packages #44848
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure
  • Backport 'Fix NavigationLock throwing a JSDisconnectedException on browser close in Blazor Server' #44806
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Send 431 when HTTP/2&3 headers are too large or many #44767
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation #44523
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation issues for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results' methods #44488
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44717
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Updated

  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #44860
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Match strangely formatted PathBase #42751 #44753
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • source-build: don't use crossgen when building for mono runtime. #44842
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2037414 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Make Kestrel prefer on-disk cert for macOS bind. #44856
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime

Issues

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • QueryProperty not set for ShellItem pages #11113
  • Android Designer for Visual Studio doesn't load custom components #11112
  • Shell.TabBarBackgroundColor with LinearGardientBrush #11111
  • BlazorWebView.GestureRecognizers don't work on Android and freezes screen #11109
    Backlog
  • [Custom Control] HotReload doesn't work for newly added nested items #11106
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor App OnBackPressed not firing after launching Modal XAML Window from Blazor #11105
  • [iOS] Content goes out of screen bounds while using modal #11104
    Backlog

Closed

  • I do not see a "create" button after clicking Build Number 7 times. #10913
  • Failed to verify code signature #10874
  • MauiIcon ForegroundScale does not work (does not scale icon under Android) #6850
  • [Bug] Deleting recipe causes nav bar change #3150
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Cannot set Editor Text Using MVVM #9556

PullRequests

Created

  • Run dotnet format on Microsoft.Maui.sln #11110
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Run dotnet format on Build.Tasks.slnf #11108
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Allow transparent modal pages #11107
    t/bug, area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Tizen] Add Label TextType #11103
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨

Merged

  • Provisionator fixes net6 branch #11085
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump provisionator task to version 2 #11092
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Add basic Android automated accessiblity testing #11097
    area/testing
  • Consolidate handlertestbase #11021
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Revert "[android] bring back `$(AndroidLinkResources)` by default" #11096
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExecuteUpdate does not work with owned entities #29483
  • ... #29481
  • ("Hello, World!") #29480

Closed

  • Add API for modifying value on row update #29464
  • Sharing JSON column between different generic implementations in TPH inheritance #29456

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update Bundled80Templates to all be 8.0 versions #14897

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the 7.0.1xx table since that's now in servicing. #14898
  • Update triggers to prevent tarball CI from running on 6.0.3xx and 6.0.4xx #14896
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #14895

Merged

  • #14522 adjusting width to avoid cropping. #14798
  • Enable codeql #14888
  • Synchronize VMR's non-`src/` content from `tarball/content` #14893
  • Refactor source-build CI triggers and pools (#14835) #14878
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #14889

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #14891
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Eliminate runtime portable build #14816
